xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels
Class NativeKernelCDF

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.functions.Function<Number,Double>
      xxl.core.math.functions.AbstractRealFunctionFunction
          xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels.AbstractKernelCDF
              xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels.NativeKernelCDF
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, RealFunction, WindowQuery
public class NativeKernelCDF
extends AbstractKernelCDF

This class implements an abstract preimplementation of a kernel based cdf estimator AbstractKernelCDF that doesn't use an explicit technique for avoiding boundary effects. Additionally, this class provides a FACTORY for generating native kernel based cdf estimators.

See Also:
KernelFunction, KernelBandwidths, AbstractRealFunctionFunction, AbstractKernelCDF, ReflectionKernelCDF, Serialized Form

Field Detail

FACTORY

public static Function FACTORY
Provides a factory for a native kernel cdf estimator , i.e., an estimator without any boundary treatment technique. The parameters needed for construction are passed to the factory by an Object[] o containing:
o[0]: used kernel function
o[1]: used sample as Object[] containing numerical data
o[2]: used bandwidth as Object of type Number

Constructor Detail

NativeKernelCDF

public NativeKernelCDF(KernelFunction kf,
                       Object[] sample,
                       double h)
                throws IllegalArgumentException
Constructs a new kernel based cdf estimator.

Parameters:
kf - used Kernel function with support restricted to [-1,1]
sample - sample of a data set given as Object[] containing objects of type Number.
h - used bandwidth for computing the estimation
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if a kernel function without restricted support to [-1,1] is given or a kernel function is given that doesn't implement the interface Integrable
See Also:
KernelFunction, KernelBandwidths
